Articles.Content:
The rules are simple: You rate the above user on a scale of 0 to 10 after how familiar he or she is to you, where 0/10 is completely unknown and 10/10 is you see them everytime.

also if you want include a comment as to how/why/where you know them from.

Let the games begin!

And rememberNO SIDE CONVERSATIONS...OR DERAILMENTS...OR GOING IN CIRCLES

we have an IRC channel for that here

Edited September 28, 2014 by briansun1

little question before this thing fail again :

How are we suppose to rate us if we're all knowing each other?

Anyway...

10/10

A game forum commarad

10/10

... ah from all the other threads we've derailed and stuff...

4/10

The thing to do is instead of the same group of people posting over and over, slow down and let other people have a turn. That way it isn't always the same people over and over again.

I'll be watching, so no side conversations. Instead talk about where you've seen someone before.

10/10

My friend moderator person guy!

6/10.

The shining jewel, not yet dusty from aeons of work as a staff member

7/10

I see you everywhere, you must be a part of the Mod specOPs spy team

6/10

Run into you in a few different places before.

EDIT: Ninja'd

1/10

I've seen you once... and that was during one of the GREAT mod post trians...

10/10

I've seen you on every game thread on the forum.

2/10

Your face is familiar. Have I sent you to a prison cell before?

10/10

And I see you on EVERY game thread on the forums too...

... no really I HATE ninjaing ninjas...

10/10

your the guy the made the new elevator thread

10/10

Where are you called Slorch, I only know you as Brian

10/10

Hey, people! Don't be afraid to post on this thread if you're new, it's a great way to get to know other users. (Maybe it's just us though... if that's true, it's pretty sad.)

10/10

We are dangerous lunatics, know you from the game forum

10/10 see you a lot

AND WHY ARE ALL THE THREADS RELOADED? WHAT DID I MISS?!?!

10/10

I see you everywhere

Please read the OP

10/10 I see you everywhere

I did. But what happened yesterday when i wasnt here. I see all my favorite threads were taken down and i want to know what i missed.

10/10

There was a forum rebellion, thead we're spammed by pics of... You know? And some even became conversation threads.

I see you everywhere...

10/10

I see you every where... and NO SIDE CONVERSATIONS
...Nope. Haven't seen you before.
0/10. Never heard of you.
5/10 I think I saw you on some forum games.....
